snippet.title: Noreya: The Gold Project - trailer reveal #metroidvania  #pixelart
snippet.description:
Tags: #indiegames #gamedev 
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1760330
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/xGPrpqjjN5

Introducing the highly-anticipated trailer for #Noreya The Gold Project! Embark on an epic adventure with our unlikely heroine ‘Kali’ as she journeys to uncover the secrets of Noreya. With stunning visuals and an epic soundtrack, players will be transported to a world full of mystery and excitement. 

Loved the trailer? Don't forget to add Noreya to your Steam wishlist and get ready to explore a world full of adventure, danger, and hidden treasures!

Join our community on Discord, where you can engage with the developers and other players. Stay up-to-date on the latest news and updates and be the first to know when you too can enter the world of Noreya!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dreamirl_games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Dreamirl
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DreamirlGames
Website: https://dreamirl.com/#gold
